attributes.action: A Damehood for Gina Miller, in recognition of her services to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Gina Miller has shown great courage in facing down threats in her determination to uphold the Rights of Parliament and the Rule of Law.
Facing personal threats in the process.
She is a beacon of freedom and should be recognised in the efforts she has made to hold the Executive ( Government) to account.
attributes.background:
To consider the UK bestowing upon Gina Miller a Damehood, in recognition of her services to the United Kingdom.
It is ironic, that a person not originally from these lands has done more to uphold the Rights of Parliament over the Executive than almost anyone else.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
